Uses of Package
biz.aduna.map.cluster

Classes in biz.aduna.map.cluster used by biz.aduna.map.cluster
Classification
          A Classification is a named set of objects.
Cluster
          A Cluster groups a set of Objects that have the exact same Classification memberships out of a given set of Classifications.
ClusterGraphPanel
          ClusterGraphPanel is a JPanel derivative that displays the contents of a ClusterMap.
ClusterMap
          The ClusterMap interface defines the methods needed to generate a cluster map visualisation of a ClusterModel.
ClusterMapFactory
          A ClusterMapFactory is capable of producing a ClusterMap instance and instances of related classes.
ClusterMapGUI
          A ClusterMapGUI combines all components created and managed by a ClusterMapMediator in a single ready-to-use GUI.
ClusterMapListener
          ClusterMapListeners are notified by a ClusterMap when its state changes, as a direct result of a method invocation on the ClusterMap.
ClusterMapMediator
          A ClusterMapMediator is a building block for constructing a GUI around a ClusterMap.
ClusterMapMediatorListener
          ClusterMapMediatorListeners are notified by a ClusterMapMediator when its state changes, as a direct result of a method invocation on the ClusterMapMediator.
ClusterModel
          A ClusterModel contains a set of Clusters that is calculated based on a set of Classifications.
XmlConstants
          XmlConstants defines the element and attribute names that are used in the XML serialization of a Classification hierarchy.
